attributes.action: make Deepdale, home of Preston North End, a national monument
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Deepdale should be reognised as a the home of football and therfore be listed as a national monument

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make Deepdale, home of Preston North End, a national monument."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17580


Prime Minister's Office
